data.name: Custom Town
data.detailed_description:
Custom Town

Please watch the last two video trailers, they will show you how to play the game and how to create address templates by yourself.

  • 233 Steam Achievements

Key Features

  • Design a town with a functioning ecosystem to fulfill your residents needs and keep them happy
  • Customize residents with different attributes, build houses for them and give them work and tasks
  • Residents act almost like real humans and use the environment to fulfill their needs
  • Residents use attributes like health attitude, intelligence, positive attitude, energy level or happiness to make decisions on their next actions
  • Adjust the work life balance of your residents to keep them happy and energized
  • Set worktimes and dinnertimes of your residents
  • Earn Money by keeping your residents happy and Softwaredevelopment
  • Build break rooms and freetime facilities like Fitness Studio or Pub
  • Unlock better items like 3D Plasma TV or Hydromassage Bathtub to make your residents happier
  • Educate your residents in school and college for different workplace education
  • Make your town nice with different and resizable ground tiles, trees, plants, flowers
  • Unlock new objects and game functions in your research lab or object design company.
  • Complex Workoutput System: your residents workoutput is based on many different factors like intelligence, happiness, health, energy, skill, luminosity, caffeine level, temperature, ...
  • Job Skill System
  • Defend your Town against attacking Zombies


Play the Bonus games by starting Custom Town from the Steam library, not from the desktop shortcut.

Slime
Slime, a "Rick Dangerous" - like jump'n'run with top notch graphics and gameplay is settled in a "Indiana Jones" - like universe.
You are tasked to find all gems and activate the "Stargate" to get to the next world.
Slime comes with 3 tricky levels and more stuff and levels in the queue.

Lost
A "Dark Souls 2D" - like Jump'n'Run Sword Fighting game.
Lost comes with 1 big level and more stuff and levels in the queue.

data.short_description:
A Town Building Game that lets you design most elements from the ground up.
Create your own addresses and houses and customize your own residents.
Watch your intelligent and autonomious residents on their own daily schedule that you have planned.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Java
